column5: Texas landscaping adorns the grounds of the adorable Boat House. You know you are in a wonderful place, relaxing and peacefulness is what you will find. When you open the door to your get-a-way the light-filled space welcomes you. The designer accents and attention to detail are just a few things you will love about The Boat House. Beautifully appointed with custom cabinetry, stained concrete floors, stainless appliances, ultra comfortable bed with fine linens, and cozy furnishings.
